attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
after 32 years loyal hardworking service
to this country i have been defeated by hardwork.after waiting 10 months for my operation,and still in agony iam now told i cannot get free prescriptions.i used all my savings to keep afloat but now i must drown.i hope england is proud of its self. im distgusted.....

rejection.details:
If you would like to sign a petition against prescription charges, there are several which are currently active. For example:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Prescription-s/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/prescriptionfree/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/medcharges/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
